page.title: 17EVENTS
page.content:
"ALICE" On July 18th.& 19th.,1985, Lyneal School performed a play called "Alice" at Ellesmere College Arts Centre. The play was written and music composed by J.Hartley,P. Panting & E. Williams and was based on the Lewis Carroll books.
The performance was in front of 2 full houses & was a huge success. Many in the audiences had never seen children perform at such a high level.
All the children(32) had parts and many had 2 or 3 as there were almost 60 roles. The 2 teachers had parts too and several adults sung or read poems. The play lasted for just over 1.5 hours, beginning at 7.30pm. A 9 year old girl,Michelle Evans, took the part of Alice.
